review: Better than Roku. Love everything about this product. I might cancel my dish tv now that I got this!
author: CSmith

review: It's easy to use and small enough to fit in the remote control container
author: Paula Ehrich

review: doesn't have all the movies and no soap operas
author: Bernadette D.

review: We have used apple tv for years and never have a problem with the internet connection. Since using this device, we have had a lot of problems with it staying connected to the internet.This product would be great if it would stay connected.
author: Chris Civitate

review: I cannot hook this up to my RCA jacks on my older TV. I can see video but cannot get audio to work. Any help anyone can be would be gratefully appreciated. I called customer service and ordered a box but it did not work leaving me with a fire stick I cannot use
author: Kristin Kaminski

review: I have a chromecast device as well and am really happy with the improved performance of this device.
author: Michael McDonnell

review: I am unable to view Seinfeld episodes. This has been reported to the development team and is being worked on for resolution. It has been close to 3 weeks and the Crackle app is still not functioning properly. ALL movies freeze, if I am lucky to get them started. Issue needs resolved.
author: ecgreen
